title: #549: Manifesting Monsters with Lon Strickler
description:
Thank you so much for tuning in for another episode of Tin Foil Hat with Sam Tripoli. This episode I welcome Author and Radio Host, Lon Strickler, to the show to discuss his decades of research into the Mothman and how he believes many of this monsters are manifestations of the mind. Great episode and thank you for your support.

Please help out our boy Off The Grid Ryan and his family by praying for his brother, Scott Davis, who passed away. There has been a Gofund me set up for Scott's family so if you could please help. Scott was a member of the swarm and couldn't have been a better guy. You will be missed Scott. Rest in peace, Homeboy!
https://www.gofundme.com/f/scott-davis-memorial-fund

MagicMind: The world's first productivity drink, a mix of 12 functional ingredients, including Matcha, nootropics that make you focus and adaptogens that help you fight off stress.  We have a special offer for my listeners from the guys at Magic Mind go to Magicmind.co/TinFoil and use the discount code at TinFoil  to get a limited 20% off your order
